Sir Carl is a knight of the Royal Army of Ardougne, killed by the player during the Underground Pass quest to collect the green paladin's badge. He gives the player food if they talk to him before throwing his badge down the well.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
25 July 2019
(update)

Sir Carl no longer respawns, or will despawn, after his paladin badge is dropped down the well, including after the quest.
